heading: HB07274
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING A BAYANIHAN HOMEBUILDING PROGRAM FOR LOW INCOME GROUPS THROUGH GRADUATED AMORTIZATION PAYMENT (GAP) SCHEME AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07274
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A BAYANIHAN HOMEBUILDING PROGRAM FOR LOW INCOME GROUPS THROUGH GRADUATED AMORTIZATION PAYMENT (GAP) SCHEME AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLAFUERTE, LUIS RAYMUND JR. F.
DATE FILED : 2018-02-27
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sahali (000 2018-03-21)2. Sy-Alvarado (000 2018-03-21)
3. Tambunting (000 2018-09-10)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2018-08-29
      2. Referred to the Subcommittee on 2018-08-29
          -The committee, upon the motion of Rep. Wilter “Sharky” Wee Palma II, decided to refer the bills on the Bayanihan Homebuilding Program to the Subcommittee on Urban Development, chaired by Rep. Gavini “Apol” C. Pancho -House Bills No. 3738 and 7274
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT ON 2018-03-05
